query.q: L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(COUNT(`pipeline_id`) AS `Pipeline 执行次数`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' } BY `resource`

eval(A/B, alias='失败率', A="L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(COUNT(`pipeline_name`)) { `ci_status` != 'success' and `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }", B="L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(COUNT(`pipeline_name`)) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }")
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(COUNT(`pipeline_name`) AS `Pipeline 执行失败次数`) { `ci_status` = 'failed' and `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(AVG(`duration`) AS `avg(执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(MAX(`duration`) AS `max(执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(PERCENTILE(`duration`, 75) AS `p75(执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(PERCENTILE(`duration`, 90) AS `p90(执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(PERCENTILE(`duration`, 99) AS `p99(执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(PERCENTILE(`duration`, 50) AS `p50(执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_job`:(COUNT(`build_id`) AS `Job 执行次数`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }

eval(A/B, alias='job 失败率', A="L::`gitlab_job`:(COUNT(`build_id`)) { `build_status` != 'success' and `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }", B="L::`gitlab_job`:(COUNT(`build_id`)) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }")
L::`gitlab_job`:(COUNT(`build_id`) AS `Job 执行失败次数`) { `build_status` = 'failed' and `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_job`:(AVG(`build_duration`) AS `avg(Job执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_job`:(MAX(`build_duration`) AS `max(Job执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_job`:(PERCENTILE(`build_duration`, 75) AS `P75(Job执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_job`:(PERCENTILE(`build_duration`, 90) AS `P90(Job执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_job`:(PERCENTILE(`build_duration`, 50) AS `P50(Job执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }
L::`gitlab_job`:(PERCENTILE(`build_duration`, 99) AS `P99(Job执行时间)`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' }

charts.name: 执行失败的 Pipleine 耗时排行（TOP 10）

query.q: L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(AVG(`duration`) AS `平均执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `ci_status` != 'success' } BY `pipeline_name`
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(MAX(`duration`) AS `最大执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `ci_status` != 'success' } BY `pipeline_name`
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(PERCENTILE(`duration`, 50) AS `P50 执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `ci_status` != 'success' } BY `pipeline_name`
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(PERCENTILE(`duration`, 75) AS `P75 执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `ci_status` != 'success' } BY `pipeline_name`
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(PERCENTILE(`duration`, 90) AS `P90 执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `ci_status` != 'success' } BY `pipeline_name`
L::`gitlab_pipeline`:(PERCENTILE(`duration`, 99) AS `P99 执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `ci_status` != 'success' } BY `pipeline_name`

charts.name: 执行失败的 Job 耗时排行（TOP 10）

query.q: L::`gitlab_job`:(AVG(`build_duration`) AS `平均执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `build_status` != 'success' } BY `build_name`
L::`gitlab_job`:(MAX(`build_duration`) AS `最大执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `build_status` != 'success' } BY `build_name`
L::`gitlab_job`:(PERCENTILE(`build_duration`, 50) AS `P50 执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `build_status` != 'success' } BY `build_name`
L::`gitlab_job`:(PERCENTILE(`build_duration`, 75) AS `P75 执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `build_status` != 'success' } BY `build_name`
L::`gitlab_job`:(PERCENTILE(`build_duration`, 90) AS `P90 执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `build_status` != 'success' } BY `build_name`
L::`gitlab_job`:(PERCENTILE(`build_duration`, 99) AS `P99 执行时间`) { `pipeline_id` = '#{pipeline_id}' and `build_status` != 'success' } BY `build_name`
